interval.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the period of time between two events, activities etc
interval.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
The interval between arrest and trial can be up to six months.
interval.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a short period of time between the parts of a play, concert etc
interval.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We can get some drinks in the interval.
interval.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the amount of difference in pitch between two musical notes
